SEARCH

Class Gradebook

java.lang.Object
GradingDatabase
Gradebook
public class Gradebook extends GradingDatabase
Author:
Irene The Gradebook class represents a grading system for an specific module and date. It extends the GradingDatabase class to store student results.

  • Constructor Details

    • Gradebook

      public Gradebook(String moduleCode, String date, String[] grades, double[] percentageCutOff, double[] score)
      Constructor for creating a Gradebook with grade details.
      Parameters:
      moduleCode - The code of the module for which the gradebook is created.
      date - The date associated with the grading results.
      grades - Array of grade labels
      percentageCutOff - Array of percentage cutoffs corresponding to each grade.
      score - Array of scores corresponding to each grade.

    • Gradebook

      public Gradebook(String moduleCode, String date)
      Constructor for creating a Gradebook with default grade details.
      Parameters:
      moduleCode - The code of the module.
      date - The date associated with the grading results.

  • Method Details

    • storeExamination

      public void storeExamination()
      Store examination results in the grading database. Go over resultsList again and store each result in the database.

    • addStudentResult

      public void addStudentResult(String id, double result)
      Add a student result to the resultsList.
      Parameters:
      id - The student ID.
      result - The result obtained by the student.

    • getGrade

      private String getGrade(double result)
      Retrieve the corresponding grade for a given result percentage.
      Parameters:
      result - The result percentage of a student.
      Returns:
      The grade associated with the result percentage.

    • getScore

      private double getScore(double result)
      Retrieve the corresponding score for a given result percentage.
      Parameters:
      result - The result percentage of a student.
      Returns:
      The score associated with the result percentage.
